Bon jeu qui continue d'être mis à jour régulièrement et se renouvelle malgré son âge.
Cependant, le matchmaking / système de ranking en compétitif est décevant voire frustrant et pourrait sûrement être amélioré ...
nach all den Stunden CS die ich habe kann ich nur sagen: Meddl Loide

C'est jeu est tout simplement génial! Un gameplay très varié avec différents modes de jeu pouvant plaire à tout le monde. Le seul point négatif que j'ai à souligner c'est le nombre de cheaters  présents dans le jeu; je trouve ça vraiment ennuyant à la longue... Mais sinon je le recommande!
Jogo muito bom, porém as vezes a comunidade é uma porra

There are no hackers here.  every man who says that the game is full of hackers is a liar and he will be punished from the god(aka lord gaben). small tips for the newcomers. 1: if you see someone looking at the ground, quit immediately. 2: before start playing make sure you know the basic insults at russian language. 3: last but not least, you have to spend at least at least 5000$ for skins before you get banned suddenly because cs go is the ONLY game that supports skins = skills.
this is a good game when playing with friends but shit when u play alone (Fuking RUssian pieces of shit)

For god sake Valve fix your game, learn from any other big game company HOW TO MAKE a good one,  even with prime i still play with cheaters in enemy team and not to mention hitboxes are garbage . Btw change your game engine, it sucks a lot, feels so buggy and unfinished.

bm mas poderia ser mutio melhor o sistema de antixiter

Had this game since beta, as I've played all the previous games. I would consider after years of updates that CS:GO has been fleshed out pretty well. Its most unfortunate issue is having too many cheaters on casual and matchmaking due to the f2p aspect and not a strong enough anti-cheat. Though with friends, and playing on third party platforms such as the free to use Faceit, it's a worthy game to play. You might still find cheaters and smurfs on third party platforms just not as plentiful and a lot better updated than Valve's current system. Happy gaming. Oh, and check out the esports scene, can be quite good especially the Majors :)
